import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Home, Calendar, Ticket, User, Bell, Search, ArrowLeft, CheckCircle, Calendar as CalIcon, RefreshCw, MessageSquare } from 'lucide-react'; const EventSphereApp = () => { // 'view' tracks which page we are looking at const [view, setView] = useState('dashboard'); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); // --- Dashboard Page View --- const DashboardView = () => ( <>

You can now access all features." /> } bgColor="#f0f0ff" title="New event added" time="Yesterday" text="Summer Workshop has been added to your calendar." /> } bgColor="#f0f0ff" title="Event updated" time="Yesterday" text="The location for Team Lunch has been changed to Main Hall." /> } bgColor="#f0f0ff" title="New comment" time="2d ago" text="Sarah replied to your post regarding the design updates." />

); // --- CSS Styles --- const styles = { container: { maxWidth: '400px', margin: '0 auto', backgroundColor: 'white', minHeight: '100vh', padding: '20px', paddingBottom: '80px', fontFamily: 'sans-serif' }, header: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '20px' }, logoGroup: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '8px' }, logoCircle: { width: '32px', height: '32px', borderRadius: '50%', backgroundColor: '#2563eb', color: 'white', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold' }, brandName: { fontWeight: '700', fontSize: '18px' }, hero: { marginBottom: '20px' }, title: { fontSize: '24px', margin: 0 }, subtitle: { color: '#94a3b8', fontSize: '14px' }, searchBox: { position: 'relative', marginBottom: '20px' }, searchIcon: { position: 'absolute', left: '12px', top: '50%', transform: 'translateY(-50%)', color: '#94a3b8' }, input: { width: '100%', padding: '12px 40px', borderRadius: '12px', border: '1px solid #f1f5f9', backgroundColor: '#f8fafc', boxSizing: 'border-box' }, statsGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: '1fr 1fr', gap: '10px', marginBottom: '25px' }, statCard: { backgroundColor: '#f1f5f9', padding: '15px', borderRadius: '12px' }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: '18px', marginBottom: '15px' }, eventCard: { borderRadius: '15px', border: '1px solid #eee', overflow: 'hidden' }, eventBanner: { height: '100px', backgroundColor: '#2563eb', color: 'white', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', fontSize: '12px', fontWeight: 'bold' }, eventInfo: { padding: '15px' }, eventFooter: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginTop: '10px' }, btn: { backgroundColor: '#2563eb', color: 'white', border: 'none', padding: '8px 15px', borderRadius: '8px', cursor: 'pointer' }, // Notification Styles notiHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '20px' }, notiList: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '12px' }, notiCard: { display: 'flex', gap: '15px', padding: '15px', borderRadius: '12px', border: '1px solid #f0f0ff' }, notiIcon: { width: '40px', height: '40px', borderRadius: '50%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center' }, clickableIcon: { cursor: 'pointer' }, bottomNav: { position: 'fixed', bottom: 0, left: '50%', transform: 'translateX(-50%)', width: '100%', maxWidth: '400px', backgroundColor: 'white', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-around', padding: '12px 0', borderTop: '1px solid #eee' }, navItem: (isActive) => ({ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', color: isActive ? '#2563eb' : '#94a3b8', cursor: 'pointer', fontSize: '11px' }), }; export default EventSphereApp;
